Name: Choice of Life: Middle Ages 2
About the game: How to rule wisely and prevent rebellion? Where to find faithful companions? How to survive in a fabulous kingdom full of dangers? In the card game Choice of Life: Middle Ages 2, you have to weigh every decision not to die ahead of time! Explore the kingdom from the snowy forests of the north to the endless fields of the south and meet its inhabitants. Rule graciously but firmly, deal with traitors, and do not confuse friends with enemies. Become a great ruler or perish in the annals of history! Key features: Colorful 2D graphics, hundreds of different cards Non-linear storyline where each choice has unique consequences Over a thousand events and 99 ways to die
